textfsm_parsed.DESCRIPTION: Interface error count high on GigabitEthernet2/0

alarm_id_type_status_description.DESCRIPTION: Interface error count high on GigabitEthernet2/0

cli_content:
================================================================================
Alarms - Global
================================================================================
ID      Type        Status     Description
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1       Critical    Active     Link Down on GigabitEthernet3/1
2       Major       Active     High temperature detected
3       Minor       Clear      Power supply 2 failure
4       Major       Active     Fan module 2 failure
5       Critical    Active     Memory usage above threshold
6       Major       Clear      Interface error count high on GigabitEthernet2/0
7       Warning     Active     Optical module not detected
8       Minor       Active     BGP neighbor down
textfsm_template:
Value ALARM_ID (\d+)
Value TYPE (\w+)
Value STATUS (\w+)
Value DESCRIPTION (.+)

Start
  ^\s*ID\s+Type\s+Status\s+Description\s*$$
  ^\s*${ALARM_ID}\s+${TYPE}\s+${STATUS}\s+${DESCRIPTION}\s*$$ -> Record
